text: jo tumhaaree prateeksha mein raha karate hain; yadi tumhen allaah kee sahaayata se vijay praapt ho, to kahate hain, kya ham tumhaare saath na the? aur yadi un (kaafiron) ka palla bhaaree rahe, to kahate hain ki kya ham tumapar chha nahin gaye the aur tumhen eemaan vaalon se bacha (nahin) rahe the? to allaah hee pralay ke din tumhaare beech nirnay karega aur allaah kaafiron ke lie eemaan vaalon par kadaapi koee raah nahin banaayega
